title: Geo Coordinates
description: The geographic coordinates of a place. Based on [schema.org](http://schema.org/GeoCoordinates).

@id.title: Coordinates ID
@id.description: The unique identifier of the coordinates.

schema:description.title: Description
schema:description.description: A description of what the coordinates identify.

schema:latitude.title: Latitude
schema:latitude.description: The signed vertical coordinate of a geographic point.

schema:longitude.title: Longitude
schema:longitude.description: The signed horizontal coordinate of a geographic point.

schema:elevation.title: Elevation
schema:elevation.description: The specific elevation of the defined coordinate. The value conforms to the [WGS84](http://gisgeography.com/wgs84-world-geodetic-system/) datum and is measured in meters.
